authenticationType.description: Authentication type for the user. You must specify USERPOOL. Valid values: `API`, `SAML`, `USERPOOL`

createdTime.description: Date and time, in UTC and extended RFC 3339 format, when the user was created.

enabled.description: Whether the user in the user pool is enabled.

firstName.description: First name, or given name, of the user.

lastName.description: Last name, or surname, of the user.

userName.description:
Email address of the user.

The following arguments are optional:

enabled.description: Whether the user in the user pool is enabled.

lastName.description: Last name, or surname, of the user.

userName.description:

The following arguments are optional:
